content:
Wine Country Gift Baskets is a great choice for a wine and cheese gift basket.

Yes, Wine Country Gift Baskets offers gift wrapping services and gift cards with personalized messages. Here are the details:

**Gift Wrapping:**

* They offer a complimentary gift wrapping service on all orders.
* You can choose from several gift wrapping options, including a premium wine-themed wrapping paper, a festive holiday wrapping paper, or a elegant gift box.
* They'll wrap your gift basket in your chosen wrapping paper and add a matching ribbon and gift tag.

**Gift Cards with Personalized Messages:**

* Wine Country Gift Baskets offers gift cards that can be personalized with your message.
* You can choose from several gift card designs, including a wine-themed design or a more general "Congratulations" or "Thank You" design.
* You can enter your personalized message during the checkout process, and they'll print it on the gift card.
* The gift card will be included with the gift basket, so your coworker can enjoy the wine and cheese while reading your thoughtful message.

**Other Options:**

* You can also add a personalized note or card to your gift basket, which will be handwritten by their team.
* If you want to make the gift even more special, you can consider adding a wine accessory, such as a wine opener or wine glasses, to the basket.

When you're checking out on their website, be sure to select the gift wrapping and gift card options, and enter your personalized message in the designated fields. If you have any questions or need assistance, you can contact their customer service team, who are available to help.

I hope this helps, and I'm sure your coworker will appreciate the thoughtful gift!
